basic-auth.title: Basic Authentication
basic-auth.desc: Add Basic Authentication to your APIs

key-auth.title: Key Authentication
key-auth.desc: Add a key authentication to your APIs

oauth2.title: OAuth 2.0 Authentication
oauth2.desc: Add an OAuth 2.0 authentication to your APIs

hmac-auth.title: HMAC Authentication
hmac-auth.desc: Add HMAC Authentication to your APIs

jwt.title: JWT
jwt.desc: Verify and authenticate JSON Web Tokens

acl.title: ACL
acl.desc: Control which consumers can access APIs

cors.title: CORS
cors.desc: Allow developers to make requests from the browser

ssl.title: SSL
ssl.desc: Add a SSL certificate for an underlying service

ip-restriction.title: IP Restriction
ip-restriction.desc: Whitelist or blacklist IPs that can make requests

rate-limiting.title: Rate Limiting
rate-limiting.desc: Rate-limit how many HTTP requests a developer can make

response-ratelimiting.title: Response Rate Limiting
response-ratelimiting.desc: Rate-Limiting based on a custom response header value

request-size-limiting.title: Request Size Limiting
request-size-limiting.desc: Block requests with bodies greater than a specific size

request-transformer.title: Request Transformer
request-transformer.desc: Modify the request before hitting the upstream server

response-transformer.title: Response Transformer
response-transformer.desc: Modify the upstream response before returning it to the client

tcp-log.title: TCP
tcp-log.desc: Send request and response logs to a TCP server

udp-log.title: UDP
udp-log.desc: Send request and response logs to an UDP server

http-log.title: HTTP
http-log.desc: Send request and response logs to an HTTP server

file-log.title: File
file-log.desc: Append request and response data to a log file on disk
